Reviews.Title: “Home in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Tstop
Reviews.Content: Fantastic appartment, in a quiet part of Istanbul. From the first meeting of Gani Akel of Aura Suites it felt like coming back to an old friend. The place is modern with everything one needs. It feels like home rather then a hotel. The place is well appointed with areas divided into work, pleasure and rest areas. Well done and very happy.

Reviews.Title: “exceptional service!”
Reviews.Author: steven r
Reviews.Content: My family and I visited Istanbul recently and we decided to stay in Gayrettepe near some family friends who live in the area, we found the Aura suites online and decided to book as it was so close to our friends apartment. We were absolutely amazed, not only at the clean, comfortable, luxurious accommodation that we were given but even more so the friendly staff that were so kind and helpful, they really made our visit to Istanbul an absolute pleasure and we will definitely return later this year!! I can highly recommend these apartments for couples and families alike! The staff's helpful and professional attitude really made a special difference to our stay. Thank you Aura suites!!

Reviews.Title: “appreciation”
Reviews.Author: kamyar1973
Reviews.Content: We(me,my wife and my daughter) , spent a wonderful week in Istanbul. It was wonderful not only because of nice historical place and spectacular natural scineries but also for staying in a clean and fully equipped two bedrooms in Aura suites. Kind and helpful mangment and other hotel personel helped our trip to be like a dream. It is highly recommanded. Kamyar Elahi

Reviews.Title: “Just Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: MO-DC2012
Reviews.Content: After hearing numerous stories on how challenging Istanbul can be to vistiors, we knew it was critical that we stay at a hotel that is not only aesthetic, but also, hospitable. Aura Suites is highly recommended for anyone who wants to experience a luxury stay without paying luxurious money. Great suites, clean, relatively large, and noise free. Yes noise free is a luxury in Instanbul. Gayrettepe is a little bit far from touristy sites such as Sultanahmet but its well worth it bc our other family members who stayed in the Sultanahmet area complained about the noise level constantly. Although Gaytrettepe is not far from Bebek, the Georgetown (Washington, DC) of Istanbul. More over the staff at aura suites is 5-Star! Derya, Denniz, and the others are extremely helpful and hospital, I would stay there just for the quality of the staff!

Reviews.Title: “A Gem in the Big City”
Reviews.Author: Victoria L
Reviews.Content: My week's stay in Istanbul was incredible and Aura Suites was outstanding as my "home away from home"...My one-bedroom penthouse suite was perfect in every way. The staff was very accommodating and went out of their way to be sure I had everything I needed. Highly recommended!! Thank you again for such a memorable stay...Blessings to each of you!

Reviews.Title: “Services from Mr. Gam is excellent”
Reviews.Author: ViviLiu
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very nice for all, only can not smork ! The services from Mr. Gam, is very good , due to his services that I will come again to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Aura Suites is a value for money and an excellent hotel to stay if you are planning a trip to Ä°stanbul.”
Reviews.Author: AmarjeetBatra
Reviews.Content: Ä° came to Ä°stanbul for a business trip and the duration was nearly a month. This place was suggested by a colleague in my company. We were 2 guys and we wanted an appartment where we should have a provision to sometimes cook also. This facility is also available here and the rooms are well equÄ±pped with all the necessities. The best thing Ä° lÄ±ked about my stay was the hospitality shown by the staff here. Ä° can say that Ä° have made nice friends here and if Ä° come next time to Ä°stanbul then Ä° shall surely prefer thÄ±s place. -Amar

Reviews.Title: “Great stay on a budget”
Reviews.Author: Discoverer_21
Reviews.Content: I normally stayed at 5 * hotels in Istanbul which are all nice but they all come with a price. There was a moment when I had to plan a trip to Istanbul on a short notice and none of the big 5* hotels were available and this is how I found Aura Suites. To be honest I was a bit skeptical but I was impressed with what I found - very clean and cozy place, everything is brand new, it does feel like home and I couldn't see a lot of difference compared with the big 5*. Yes, there is no mini bar and no room service but most of the time I had dinner with my colleagues so it really didn't matter. And it does come with a price that the big 5* hotels can't beat (aprox. half of the price of a 5*). The personel were always nice and ready to assist. I had a great time at Aura and I will go back. The only downside is that not a lot of taxis know this place so it takes a while to find it.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, Ä± was away from house but Ä± feel that Ä± am at house very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: MetinS
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay, Ä± was away from house but Ä± feel that Ä± am at house very friendly staff
